Uses of Class
react.Slot

    • Uses of Slot in react

      Subclasses of Slot in react 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UnitSlot
      A Slot for use when the type of emitted signal is ignored.
      Methods in react that return Slot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends T> 
      Slot<S>      		 Slot.andThen(Slot<? super S> after)
      Returns a new slot that invokes this slot and then evokes after.
      Slot<Try<T>> RPromise.completer()
      Returns a slot that can be used to complete this promise.
      <S> Slot<S> Slot.compose(Function<S,T> f)
      Returns a slot that maps values via f and then passes them to this slot.
      Slot<T> Value.slot()
      Returns a slot which can be used to wire this value to the emissons of a Signal or another value.
      Slot<T> Signal.slot()
      Returns a slot which can be used to wire this signal to the emissons of a Signal or another value.
      static <T> Slot<T> Slots.trace(String message, Slot<T> slot)
      Returns a slot that logs the supplied message (via System.err) with the emitted value appended to it before passing the emitted value on to slot.
      Methods in react with parameters of type Slot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends T> 
      Slot<S>      		 Slot.andThen(Slot<? super S> after)
      Returns a new slot that invokes this slot and then evokes after.
      RFuture<T> RFuture.bindComplete(Slot<Boolean> slot)
      Convenience method to ValueView.connectNotify(react.ValueView.Listener<? super T>) slot to RFuture.isComplete().
      Connection SignalView.connect(Slot<? super T> slot)
      Connects this signal to the supplied slot, such that when an event is emitted from this signal, the slot will be notified.
      Connection AbstractSignal.connect(Slot<? super T> slot) 
      void SignalView.disconnect(Slot<? super T> slot)
      Disconnects the supplied slot from this signal if connect was called with it.
      void AbstractSignal.disconnect(Slot<? super T> slot) 
      RFuture<T> RFuture.onComplete(Slot<? super Try<T>> slot)
      Causes slot to be notified when this future is completed.
      RFuture<T> RFuture.onFailure(Slot<? super Throwable> slot)
      Causes slot to be notified if/when this future is completed with failure.
      RFuture<T> RFuture.onSuccess(Slot<? super T> slot)
      Causes slot to be notified if/when this future is completed with success.
      static <T> Slot<T> Slots.trace(String message, Slot<T> slot)
      Returns a slot that logs the supplied message (via System.err) with the emitted value appended to it before passing the emitted value on to slot.
